title: Client Bugsplat Error
body:
Last night my client crashed when I was trying to launch a game after champ select. It went straight into auto repairing files which prevented me from re-launching and joining my game in progress. This went on for about 5 mins before it let me back in. I finally connected and played safe trying to catch up.

At the end of the game in after game lobby I get a warning notification about leaving games from the Leave Buster. I never afk or leave games. It's unfair for people to get this warning if the client crashed and decided to repair itself for 5 mins.

Has anyone else had this happening to them lately?

Hopefully, Riot will find a way to get the client to tell the difference between an afk'er and someone who is having technical difficulties.

replies.body:
I looked into this [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), and it seems to have resulted in the game you went 0/4/5 as Kennen.  If you're getting bugsplats and repairs, then bad game files or even drivers could be failing to render your game.

If this is still happening, I recommend  going through each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshot this towards a more permanent fix.  I hope that helps!

I have followed the instructions in the game crash guide you linked me to, so hopefully that's fixed it.

Also, I don't know if this is possible, but is there any way to remove a Leave Buster warning from my account? I never afk or leave games and certainly didn't do so last night purposely. If not, I understand. I just don't want an issue if the game crashes again and I end up being banned.

Thanks again for your help and support. If I have any other problems I will post here for help.

Have a good evening!

Thanks! I'll look into this when I get home. 

Yeah, it was that game. That was my last game last night because I was afraid it would crash again and I'd be punished by Leave Buster.
